rows.label: tlk70000059_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Ever run up against a monster you've
fought plenty of times, except this
time it's proving to be a real toughie?

rows.label: tlk70000059_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Well, you might wanna take a
look at each other's elements,
and what your weakness are.

rows.label: tlk70000059_01_msg0003
rows.name:
'Cause if your element is fire and
the enemy's is water, you're gonna
get your arse handed to you!

rows.label: tlk70000059_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Elements can easily spell the
difference between victory and
defeat, so pay close attention to 'em!
